PairMintCallback(uint256,uint256,bytes).details: In the implementation you must pay the pool tokens owed for the mint. The caller of this method must be checked to be a Pair deployed by the canonical Factory.

params.data: Any data passed through by the caller via the Mint call

PairMintCallback(uint256,uint256,bytes).notice: Called to `msg.sender` after executing a mint via Pair
